message.content:
I need to identify the line item that represents "the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life," which is depreciation.

Looking at the cash flow statement provided, I can see a line item specifically labeled "Depreciation" with a value of 45760.13.

Depreciation is indeed the systematic allocation of the cost of tangible assets over their useful lives, so this is the value I'm looking for.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '45760.13'} }
```
